past-events.title: Month of Holiday Spirit
past-events.subtitle: Festive events all month long!
past-events.body: We're dropping tons of festive holiday events all month long to keep you in the holiday spirit!

past-events.title: Advent Calendar Quests
past-events.subtitle: New quests daily!
past-events.body: Complete daily quests for exclusive festive rewards. Complete each week's quests before they close on Saturdays. Auxilary quests drop throughout.

past-events.title: Holiday Present Building
past-events.subtitle: Give the gift of holiday spirit!
past-events.body: Build your own present for other players to give you gifts in. Decorate the holiday tree with cool ornaments. Explore the surrounding festive area for hidden secrets.

past-events.title: Community Vote Goals
past-events.subtitle: Festive rewards all month long!
past-events.body: Vote for the server to help us reach our community goals! Goals for every 500 total votes. Bath bombs will drop on Jan 8th.

past-events.title: New Minigame Fridays
past-events.subtitle: Brand new challenges dropping every Friday!
past-events.body: We are dropping 4 new minigames this month! Some from old maps, some never before seen, but all are amazing. Ice Tower, Bail Santa, Blackout, and a mystery game!

past-events.title: Month of Harvest
past-events.subtitle: A month celebrating the harvest!
past-events.body: Bask in the beauty of the harvest season with this month of events.

past-events.title: State Fair Event
past-events.subtitle: Come one, come all!
past-events.body: This fun-tastic fall fair will sure knock your socks off! Build a booth or attraction to earn participation tickets. Prizes for top entries.

past-events.title: Raffle of Harvest Surplus
past-events.subtitle: Participate to win 50,000z
past-events.body: Each event this month will give out entries to this raffle! The more you participate the higher your chances at winning! Reward harvested from long inactive players.

past-events.title: Community Vote Goals
past-events.subtitle: Double the rewards, double the fun!
past-events.body: Vote for the server to help us reach our community goals! Goals for every 500 total votes. Bath bombs will drop on Dec 4th.

past-events.title: Thankful-grams
past-events.subtitle: Show your appreciation!
past-events.body: Let other players know that you care by sending out thankful-grams! The people sent gifts to are entered into a special raffle. Participants entered into the monthly raffle.

past-events.title: Meme Origins Movie Knight
past-events.subtitle: Meme it up all night!
past-events.body: A month filled with the origins of memes! Bee Movie, Despicable Me, Emperor's New Groove, Shrek, Napoleon Dynamite, Mean Girls, Office Space, Matrix.

past-events.title: Month of Spooks
past-events.subtitle: Spooky events releasing all month long!
past-events.body: All month long we're bringing you the spooks in full force! Check out this video for a sneak peak at what is in store to come this month. Beware of the spooks that go bump in the night! Surprise events not yet showcased will pop up too! Beware!

past-events.title: Trick-or-Treat
past-events.subtitle: Build a house in the spooky neighborhood!
past-events.body: Add your spooky flair while building a house in our spooky village to win fabulous prizes. Prepare your house to give out treats or tricks come All Hallow's Eve

past-events.title: Hexed Voting Rewards
past-events.subtitle: I'll put a spell on you!
past-events.body: In addition to the lucrative voting rewards we normally have, there's now a 20% chance for extra rewards. Hexed voting rewards are so chaotic they don't just give out money, but jobs points and vote points too!

past-events.title: Community Vote Goals
past-events.subtitle: Help us climb the mountain!
past-events.body: Every 1,000 total server votes will earn the whole community awesome rewards at the end of the month. Free bath bombs, boosts, vote points and new head collections added to the vote shop!

past-events.title: Raffle of Dead Souls
past-events.subtitle: The dead soon shall rise again!
past-events.body: Do some grave robbing and win the money from banned accounts! Careful to avoid waking the dead, we don't need more zombies!

past-events.title: More Events Soon ...
past-events.subtitle: New events happening all the time
past-events.body: Our event planning team is always working on the next big event!
